title: Piaggio looks to enhance premium play; forays into bike segment with Aprilia RS 457
description: Piaggio Group plans to expand its presence in the premium two-wheeler market in India to meet the increasing demand for feature-rich models. The company, which already sells premium scooters in the country, recently unveiled its Aprilia RS 457 mid-size bike. Piaggio aims to start selling the bike in India from January next year, followed by launches in other areas.
